title: 2. Branching
content:
## Branching
```shell
# Create a new branch 
git branch alt-branchname

# switch to new branch 
git checkout branchname

# Return to master branch
git checkout master

### Merge master with alternate timeline
git merge alt-branchname
```


## Branching
```shell
# Create a new branch 
git branch alt-branchname

# switch to new branch 
git checkout branchname

# Return to master branch
git checkout master

### Merge master with alternate timeline
git merge alt-branchname
```
